data.text: When you sit down to eat a meal with a ◄government official/king►,
Even if you ◄have a big appetite/want to eat a lot of food►,
Do not want to eat a lot of his fine food,
Do not cause yourself to become very tired by working very hard to become rich;
because as soon as you look [MTY] at all the money that you have acquired, it will be gone;
If someone who is stingy invites you to a meal,
because he will be thinking about how much the food cost that you are eating.
When you realize what he is really thinking, it will cause you to want to vomit what you have eaten;
◄Do not waste time by/It is useless► talking to foolish people;
Do not steal someone’s property by removing a boundary marker that has been there for a long time,
because Yahweh is strong, and he is like a relative that has the responsibility to defend them,
Pay attention to what your teachers teach you,
Do not refuse to discipline your children;
and it may save them from going to the place where dead people are.
My son/child, if you [SYN] become wise,
I [SYN] will rejoice when I hear you [SYN] say what is right/wise.
Do not envy sinful people;
If you do that, you will be happy in the future,
My son/child, listen carefully to me and become wise,
Do not associate with those who drink a lot of ◄wine/strong drink►
because drunkards and gluttons will become poor;
Pay attention to what your father tells you,
Try to know/learn what is wise, and get good instruction and understanding;
Righteous children will cause their parents to be very happy;
Do what will cause your father to be glad
My son, heed what I say to you,
Prostitutes and immoral women [DOU] are like [MET] a deep pit
They wait for you like robbers [SIM],
I will tell you [RHQ] what kind of people are always miserable and sad.
It is those who drink a lot of wine,
Do not look with pleasure at red wine that looks nice, and which sparkles when it is poured out into cups,
because the next morning you will feel like you have been bitten by a poisonous snake [DOU].
You [SYN] will think that you are seeing strange/weird things,
You will think you are in a ship that is tossing on the sea;
You will say, “I think that someone struck me, but he did not hurt me;
